Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.persistence

Class ModelPolymorphicTypeAdapterFactory<T>

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.persistence.ModelPolymorphicTypeAdapterFactory<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type that is handled by this adapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gson.TypeAdapterFactory
public class ModelPolymorphicTypeAdapterFactory<T> extends Object implements com.google.gson.TypeAdapterFactory
TypeAdapterFactory that correctly handler the model's polymorphic types.

Each subtype should be manually registered with registerSubtype(Class).

The polymorphism is handled by adding to the root object a key with the name TYPE_KEY containing the class's canonical name. During deserialization the class whose name is in the property TYPE_KEY will be effectively instantiated.
